predicate.note: Frames file for 'notch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison.

roleset.name: make a notch, mark

example.name: the one example
example.text: Drug companies in the key index also notched gains as market-makers searched for stock in anticipation of demand due to the sector's defensive qualities.
example.arg: Drug companies in the key index
as market-makers searched for stock in anticipation of demand due to the sector's defensive qualities

example.name: showing arg2
example.text: After another successful conquest, John notched his bedpost.

roleset.note: I doubt you could see both Arg1 and Arg2 in a single sentence, but I don't want to split the roleset.

roleset.name: move incrementally

example.name: the other example
example.text: After the trading halt in the S&P 500 pit in Chicago, waves of selling continued to hit stocks themselves on the Big Board, and specialists continued *trace* to notch prices down.

roleset.note: Refer to 'edge' for additional examples, or 'move'.
